definition: abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
(old) jade tablet (a ceremonial badge of rank)

sentences.english: A draw between Mexico and Uruguay in their final match would put the 1998 champions and 2006 runners-up out.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥和乌拉圭只要打平就可以做掉法国人。

sentences.english: The Uruguay international is set to sign for the French club on-loan to the end of this season.
sentences.chinese: 乌拉圭国脚下半赛季将可能被租借到法甲的波尔多队。

sentences.english: South Korea's Cha Du-ri reacts after losing to Uruguay June 26.
sentences.chinese: 韩国的车斗里的反应后输给乌拉圭6月26日。

sentences.english: For instance, Uruguay created a debt agency in 2005.
sentences.chinese: 例如，乌拉圭在2005年建立一个债务机构。

sentences.english: Uruguay issued a set of Beijing Olympics-themed postal stamps Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 乌拉圭22日发行一套北京奥运主题纪念邮票。

sentences.english: Uruguay and Mexico both reached the second stage。
sentences.chinese: 乌拉圭和墨西哥队同时晋级下一轮比赛。

sentences.english: Alexandro Garcia was born in Uruguay in 1970. He began making drawings after seeing a UFO.
sentences.chinese: 1970年生于乌拉圭，在目击到飞碟后开始画画。

sentences.english: Uruguay lived up to its reputation and delighted the home fans by disposing of one team after another.
sentences.chinese: 乌拉圭队不负众望过关斩将，乡亲们都非常高兴。

sentences.english: The Uruguay international scored one and assisted another during an all-action 90 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 乌拉圭国脚踢满了全场，奉上一粒入球以及一次助攻。

sentences.english: Mujica, 74, became the 52nd president of Uruguay.
sentences.chinese: 今年74岁的穆希卡将成为乌拉圭第52任总统。

sentences.english: Batlle said that Uruguay has attached importance to the development of its relations with China.
sentences.chinese: 巴特列表示，乌拉圭重视发展同中国的关系。

sentences.english: Still some Uruguayans want more freedom.
sentences.chinese: 一些乌拉圭人还想要更多的自由。

sentences.english: Many flights in Chile and Uruguay have also been cancelled.
sentences.chinese: 智利和乌拉圭许多航班被取消。

sentences.english: The Uruguayan striker Diego Forlan scored the decisive goal in the 116th minute.
sentences.chinese: 乌拉圭前锋弗兰在第116分钟攻入了制胜的一球。

sentences.english: Uruguayan football has never failed to generate opinion over the years.
sentences.chinese: 乌拉圭足球这些年来并没有少制造舆论。

sentences.english: They saluted Suarez, whose act of desperation wound up saving the Celeste.
sentences.chinese: 他们赞扬苏亚雷斯，称其拯救了乌拉圭。

definition: Côte d'Ivoire or Ivory Coast in West Africa
